thread.title: Today's radar hot spot: Montgomery Cross Rd

author: Savannah Morning News
title: Today's radar hot spot: Montgomery Cross Rd
text:
By Savannah Morning News Savannah-Chatham Metro police will be operating radar hot spots along Montgomery Cross Road.
Police remind drivers there is zero tolerance for speeding in school zones.
